name: @tekup/restaurantiq
description: AI-Powered Restaurant Intelligence SaaS for Danish Market

scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d && echo 'RestaurantIQ development environment started'
scripts.build: echo 'Building RestaurantIQ microservices...' && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm run build 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend build pending - package.json needed in backend/'
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build 2>/dev/null || echo 'Frontend build pending - package.json needed in frontend/'
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.setup: docker-compose up -d && echo 'RestaurantIQ services started. Check README.md for next steps.'
